div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1656 Garbieh, Garb√Æya province, Delta, (420) 1896 Burial: c. 330 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 9 AV, ? AR Philip II: 4 AV st. Athens: tetradr. (a large number, mostly ctmk.) Citium: 1 AV hemist. Persia: 4 darics Disposition: Alexandreia Dutilh, JIAN 1898, p. 148; RBN 1905, p. 162 Jenkins, NC 1955, p. 150 (poss. part of Demanhur hd., no. 1654 above)
